txt.en: Hrímil Frost-heart, the Herald of Winter, is one of the most powerful and ancient creatures in Middle-earth, and you have just stumbled into her lair.
The Anvil of Winterstith: Hrímil Frost-heart -- Tier 3
Survive your encounter with Hrímil Frost-heart
Hrímil Frost-heart, the Herald of Winter, is one of the most powerful and ancient creatures in Middle-earth, and you have just stumbled into her lair.
You have survived the wrath of the ancient cold-dragon. She has sealed herself inside the Anvil, and cannot reach you, for now.
